data.description:
Gravity Sketch is the immersive 3D design tool that empowers you to create, share and collaborate on your best design ideas. Go beyond the bounds of 2D sketching to express yourself in a virtual studio and explore iterations of designs. Communicate design intent with greater clarity, and invite others to help shape your ideas and decision-making.

Key Features:

Intuitive 3D expression: Express your ideas at 1:1 scale in a virtual studio, just as you imagined them. Gestural actions and simple tools open up infinite possibilities.

Refinement tooling: Take sketches further with surfacing and sculpting tools. Adjust shapes, proportions, textures, and lighting to capture the right details you need to communicate your idea.

Collaboration: Invite colleagues, friends, or clients to join your virtual space in-headset or on screen to work together in real-time. Make faster decisions together on design direction, reducing your product‚Äôs time to market by 70+%.

Organization and storage: Access an extensive library of ready-to-use 3D assets, including models, materials, and environments. Import and export your own creations, incorporate them into workflows effortlessly via LandingPad.

Community: Join a passionate community of designers. Explore comprehensive tutorials, learn from experts, and get inspired by others‚Äô Gravity Sketch projects.

Help email: support@gravitysketch.com 
General inquiries: hello@gravitysketch.com
To unlock our enterprise capabilities please contact us

changelog.change_log:
VR

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- You can now organise layers into layer groups by either dragging them or grouping them with the purple button in the Layers menu.
- Holding the shift trigger while grabbing and moving sketch objects will now display a bounding box which can be used to snap to axes and the stage floor, if enabled.
- Added a ‚ÄòBox‚Äô selection mode to the Selection tool as the default mode. When you click the trigger and drag, everything within the box will be added to the selection. Hold the shift trigger while selecting to add to an existing selection.
- Added a purple button menu to the selection tool with the following options:
    - Selection Mode
    - Bounding Box
    - Show Gumball
    - Select Groups
    - Restrict to Mirror
- You can now duplicate objects while moving them using the Selection tool gumball.
- Added a new Section View tool. Drawing a box with this tool selected will cause everything within the box to become temporarily invisible, allowing you to take a section view of your sketch.
- Reworked the new user First Sketch experience.
- Improved speed of FBX imports, particularly files containing many individual objects.
- Improved the export of subdivision objects to FBX when the "control mesh" option is selected. Notable changes are:
    - Thickened objects export as a single mesh, whether they are baked or not.
    - Fixed a bug where unbaked thickened surfaces would not open in Alias.
    - Fixed a bug where subd surfaces with several disconnected components would not open in Alias.
    - Fixed a bug where some vertices of thickened objects on the mirror would be duplicated.
- Added a Round Corners toggle to the subdivision edit menu. When enabled the corners of open subdivision faces will be rounded as in previous versions; when disabled these corners will be sharp.
- Changed the appearance of subdivision creases on boundary and boundary-adjacent edges to match industry standards.
- Baked thickened/offset subdivision objects now look identical to their pre-baked counterparts.
- Added a Mesh Quality export option for FBX and OBJ exports that determines the complexity of objects upon being exported as meshes.
- Moved Export out of the Save menu into its own menu.
- Added various export option presets for different target applications such as Blender, VRED and Alias.
- The on-controller quick Export button will now immediately trigger an export with the last-selected export settings.
- Moved Flip Normals tool to the main tool selector.
- There is no longer a restriction on moving objects closer to or further away from the mirror while exporting . The functionality has now been moved to a Restrict to Mirror setting to the Selection tool menu.
- Added ‚ÄúChoose a Preset‚Äù text to rigged chassis menu when a preset has not yet been chosen.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- You can now correctly see other users‚Äô graphical option UI toggles on their menus in Collab according to their hardware rather than yours.
- Made the history clock on Vive wand controllers harder to trigger by accident.
- Fixed subdivision geometry disappearing when disconnecting an edge from the mirror while holding the shift trigger.
- Cleaned up the positioning of the ‚ÄòGumdrop Height‚Äô slider in the Environments menu.
- Prevented notifications overlapping when taking an instant photo in a Collab room and simultaneously uploading it to the cloud.
- Added the minus icon to the red button when grabbing layers.
- Fixed scaling the screenshot menu and then taking an instant photo causing the screenshot to not scale by the same amount as the menu.
- Fixed inverted normals on subdivision toruses.
- Fixed selecting an environment preset in Collab that has an active custom HDR causing the HDR to be disabled.
- You can now edit the measurement value of an import in the import menu without it becoming inaccurate.
- The thicken/offset measurement value no longer renders in front of all geometry and UI.
- Fixed some older reference image files rotating 90 degrees on export to FBX or GLB.
- Can no longer use the subdivision merge tool on objects more than 10,000 polygons to bypass the 10,000 polygon subdivision conversion limit.
- Fixed Quest 3 defaulting to Quest 1 controllers when launching via Steam Link.
- Improved message when attempting to join a Collab room on an out of date version.
- You can now interact with the edit panel when the subdivision Separate tool is selected.
- Fixed viewpoint previews in the Viewpoints menu sometimes being inaccurate when jumping between viewpoints.
- You can now successfully launch an out of date Windows launcher build from an elevated permissions directory without needing elevated permissions.
- Fixed the order of the three most recent files in the lobby being incorrect if one of them was a local file.
- Merging a mirrored subdivision objects into a NURBS objects that sits across the mirror will no longer leave orphaned vertices.
- Fixed positioning of Quest controllers in SteamVR being slightly too high.
- Fixed textures applying incorrectly to thickened surfaces.
- Fixed a case where offsetting a subd object, extruding an edge then switching to thicken could cause an invalid surface.
- Tapping on a text entry field twice in a row in the web browser no longer causes the blue button menu to become unopenable.
- Fixed passthrough being visible through several materials that were meant to be opaque.
- FBX files with transparency will now retain their transparency if imported back into Gravity sketch.
- Fixed ghost previews of NURBS surfaces remaining present when hitting the undo button when creating a surface with point mode.
- Grabbing and duplicating every point on a subdivision object no longer leaves ghost points for the duration of your grab.
- HDR reflections are now applied to measurement objects.
- Fixed an issue where another user in Collab baking mirror on more than one object at once would cause all but one of the objects to become uninteractable to you.
- Added missing Reset Weight option to the Volume edit menu.
- Fixed period key on the sign-in keyboard within symbols section not being functional.
- When performing an on-device export to cloud, the "Please Stand By" screen now properly dismisses before the upload to cloud is complete.
- Fixed the level of detail slider for imported meshes sometimes having the opposite of the intended effect.
- Fixed some menu interactions counting as placement of a point when drawing a stroke in point mode.
- Fixed z-fighting in menus when navigating file directories of guest teams.
- The first time you change an option in the Workspace menu in a Collab room that has a custom HDR no longer give a false notification you are uploading an HDR.
- The view point switching UI hint over the the thumbstick now disappears when entering edit mode.
- Multiple levels of grouping are now preserved when importing a sketch file.
- Fixed there being no visible edit tool selected immediately after converting an object to suvdivision.
- Fixed a case where changing the font of existing text in the 3D Text tool preview could cause overlap with the UI.
- Fixed text sometimes overflowing its bounds on the on-controller notification when saving or exporting to a longer directory.
- Can now open template files via recents section in lobby.
- Fixed tooltip on Collab rooms in lobby saying ‚ÄúClick to Open Sketch‚Äù.
- Removed HDR reflections from Collab avatar preview in LandingPad Collab menu.
- Moving an edge on a subdivision object while it is highlighted by a subd tool no longer causes the edge highlight to remain in its original place.
- Moving font files from cloud to local no causes the app to think they‚Äôre sketch files.
- Remove apostrophe from file name when exporting a free Collab room.
- Fixed a case where some subdivision surfaces could fail to import.
- Fixed certain FBX files failing to import.
- Very large objects that are scaled down are no longer coloured completely black.
- Thumbnails are now preserved for more file formats if moving them from cloud to local files.
- View points in a sketch file are now imported properly regardless of the method used to import them.
- Free Collab rooms now appear in recently accessed files/rooms list in lobby.
- Dragging a single sketch object with a texture into the import menu no longer uploads/saves it as a reference image rather than a prefab.
- Selection with the selection tool is no longer frequently accidentally cancelled when selecting locally mirrored objects if the controller is too near the gumball/gimbal UI.
- The import menu now shows more than 100 files in a cloud folder.
- Moving or scaling points with the non-drawing hand thumbstick while sliding edges or vertices no longer breaks the sliding constraints and repositions the grabbed points/edges to the position of the controller.
- In Collab you now see other users‚Äô shadow and quality option toggles in their menus according to their hardware rather than your own.

Screen Collab

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Added proxy network support for macOS.
- Added various export option presets for different target applications such as Blender, VRED and Alias.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Improved scaling of edit points when following a VR user.
- Fixed being able to exit a view point by clicking and dragging the mouse with the eraser selected.
- Fixed being sometimes able to draw and move the camera at the same time.
- Annotations are no longer sometimes visible when you‚Äôre not at the associated view point.
- Can now save a screenshot when in another user‚Äôs free Collab room.
- Fixed crash when pressing the Comment hotkey when viewing a local file.
- Pen annotations no longer render over the top of the screenshot save menu.
- Tool cursor is now cleared on leaving the room.
- Fixed very small measurement objects being invisible.

VR

- Reworked the new user First Sketch experience.

- Added a Round Corners toggle to the subdivision edit menu. When enabled the corners of open subdivision faces will be rounded as in previous versions; when disabled these corners will be sharp.
- Changed the appearance of subdivision creases on boundary and boundary-adjacent edges to match industry standards.
- Baked thickened/offset subdivision objects now look identical to their pre-baked counterparts.
- Added a Mesh Quality export option for FBX and OBJ exports that determines the complexity of objects upon being exported as meshes.
- Moved Export out of the Save menu into its own menu.

- The on-controller quick Export button will now immediately trigger an export with the last-selected export settings.

- There is no longer a restriction on moving objects closer to or further away from the mirror while exporting . The functionality has now been moved to a Restrict to Mirror setting to the Selection tool menu.
- Added ‚ÄúChoose a Preset‚Äù text to rigged chassis menu when a preset has not yet been chosen.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- You can now correctly see other users‚Äô graphical option UI toggles on their menus in Collab according to their hardware rather than yours.
- Made the history clock on Vive wand controllers harder to trigger by accident.

- Fixed inverted normals on subdivision toruses.

- You can now edit the measurement value of an import in the import menu without it becoming inaccurate.
- The thicken/offset measurement value no longer renders in front of all geometry and UI.
- Fixed some older reference image files rotating 90 degrees on export to FBX or GLB.
- Can no longer use the subdivision merge tool on objects more than 10,000 polygons to bypass the 10,000 polygon subdivision conversion limit.
- Fixed Quest 3 defaulting to Quest 1 controllers when launching via Steam Link.
- Improved message when attempting to join a Collab room on an out of date version.
- You can now interact with the edit panel when the subdivision Separate tool is selected.
- Fixed viewpoint previews in the Viewpoints menu sometimes being inaccurate when jumping between viewpoints.
- You can now successfully launch an out of date Windows launcher build from an elevated permissions directory without needing elevated permissions.
- Fixed the order of the three most recent files in the lobby being incorrect if one of them was a local file.
- Merging a mirrored subdivision objects into a NURBS objects that sits across the mirror will no longer leave orphaned vertices.
- Fixed positioning of Quest controllers in SteamVR being slightly too high.
- Fixed textures applying incorrectly to thickened surfaces.
- Fixed a case where offsetting a subd object, extruding an edge then switching to thicken could cause an invalid surface.
- Tapping on a text entry field twice in a row in the web browser no longer causes the blue button menu to become unopenable.
- Fixed passthrough being visible through several materials that were meant to be opaque.
- FBX files with transparency will now retain their transparency if imported back into Gravity sketch.
- Fixed ghost previews of NURBS surfaces remaining present when hitting the undo button when creating a surface with point mode.
- Grabbing and duplicating every point on a subdivision object no longer leaves ghost points for the duration of your grab.
- HDR reflections are now applied to measurement objects.
- Fixed an issue where another user in Collab baking mirror on more than one object at once would cause all but one of the objects to become uninteractable to you.
- Added missing Reset Weight option to the Volume edit menu.
- Fixed period key on the sign-in keyboard within symbols section not being functional.
- When performing an on-device export to cloud, the "Please Stand By" screen now properly dismisses before the upload to cloud is complete.
- Fixed the level of detail slider for imported meshes sometimes having the opposite of the intended effect.
- Fixed some menu interactions counting as placement of a point when drawing a stroke in point mode.
- Fixed z-fighting in menus when navigating file directories of guest teams.
- The first time you change an option in the Workspace menu in a Collab room that has a custom HDR no longer give a false notification you are uploading an HDR.
- The view point switching UI hint over the the thumbstick now disappears when entering edit mode.
- Multiple levels of grouping are now preserved when importing a sketch file.
- Fixed there being no visible edit tool selected immediately after converting an object to suvdivision.
- Fixed a case where changing the font of existing text in the 3D Text tool preview could cause overlap with the UI.
- Fixed text sometimes overflowing its bounds on the on-controller notification when saving or exporting to a longer directory.
- Can now open template files via recents section in lobby.
- Fixed tooltip on Collab rooms in lobby saying ‚ÄúClick to Open Sketch‚Äù.
- Removed HDR reflections from Collab avatar preview in LandingPad Collab menu.
- Moving an edge on a subdivision object while it is highlighted by a subd tool no longer causes the edge highlight to remain in its original place.
- Moving font files from cloud to local no causes the app to think they‚Äôre sketch files.
- Remove apostrophe from file name when exporting a free Collab room.
- Fixed a case where some subdivision surfaces could fail to import.
- Fixed certain FBX files failing to import.
- Very large objects that are scaled down are no longer coloured completely black.
- Thumbnails are now preserved for more file formats if moving them from cloud to local files.
- View points in a sketch file are now imported properly regardless of the method used to import them.
- Free Collab rooms now appear in recently accessed files/rooms list in lobby.
- Dragging a single sketch object with a texture into the import menu no longer uploads/saves it as a reference image rather than a prefab.
- Selection with the selection tool is no longer frequently accidentally cancelled when selecting locally mirrored objects if the controller is too near the gumball/gimbal UI.
- The import menu now shows more than 100 files in a cloud folder.
- Moving or scaling points with the non-drawing hand thumbstick while sliding edges or vertices no longer breaks the sliding constraints and repositions the grabbed points/edges to the position of the controller.
- In Collab you now see other users‚Äô shadow and quality option toggles in their menus according to their hardware rather than your own.

Screen Collab

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Added proxy network support for macOS.
- Added various export option presets for different target applications such as Blender, VRED and Alias.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Improved scaling of edit points when following a VR user.
- Fixed being able to exit a view point by clicking and dragging the mouse with the eraser selected.
- Fixed being sometimes able to draw and move the camera at the same time.
- Annotations are no longer sometimes visible when you‚Äôre not at the associated view point.
- Can now save a screenshot when in another user‚Äôs free Collab room.
- Fixed crash when pressing the Comment hotkey when viewing a local file.
- Pen annotations no longer render over the top of the screenshot save menu.
- Tool cursor is now cleared on leaving the room.
- Fixed very small measurement objects being invisible.

VR

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

VR

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

VR

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue that caused personal accounts that were deactivated from an organization to be locked out of their personal workspace if the organization was the last workspace they accessed prior to deactivation.

VR

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue that caused personal accounts that were deactivated from an organization to be locked out of their personal workspace if the organization was the last workspace they accessed prior to deactivation.

VR

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Logging in to a different LandingPad account than the previously logged in account will now give the user a choice to delete autosaves on the device or cancel the login.

VR

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Logging in to a different LandingPad account than the previously logged in account will now give the user a choice to delete autosaves on the device or cancel the login.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue where FBX exports that contained multiple objects with the same material name could share the same color even when not the same color in Gravity Sketch.
- Fixed an issue where connecting subdivision to the mirror, moving it off of the world mirror then baking mirror caused the newly baked copy to behave as if still attached to original.
- Fixed an issue where connecting subdivison or strokes to the mirror, moving it off the world mirror, baking mirror then remirroring the original caused it to be mirrored on local mirror rather than world mirror.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue where FBX exports that contained multiple objects with the same material name could share the same color even when not the same color in Gravity Sketch.
- Fixed an issue where connecting subdivision to the mirror, moving it off of the world mirror then baking mirror caused the newly baked copy to behave as if still attached to original.
- Fixed an issue where connecting subdivison or strokes to the mirror, moving it off the world mirror, baking mirror then remirroring the original caused it to be mirrored on local mirror rather than world mirror.

VR

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed depth of field slider on screenshot also applying to view points.
- Crease data is now included in FBX control mesh exports of thickened subdivision objects.
- Fixed a frequent request to server causing issues.

VR

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed depth of field slider on screenshot also applying to view points.
- Crease data is now included in FBX control mesh exports of thickened subdivision objects.
- Fixed a frequent request to server causing issues.

VR

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Subdivision and crease data is now included in FBX control mesh exports. This allows tools like Blender and Alias to apply crease and subd modifiers automatically.
- Improved stroke performance.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed ‚ÄòShared With Me‚Äô section in LandingPad Collab menu not showing if the user was not part of any organization teams.
- Can no longer see grab highlight of objects dropped on to an invisible layer.
- Closed volumes such as strokes and text objects no longer export as double-sided in FBX exports.
- Fixed some environments causing LIV avatars to be invisible.
- Disabled import, save and export for reviewer and viewer licence members in organizations.
- Fixed measurement readout on import preview being incorrect if you changed the unit and then the value of measurement.

VR

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Subdivision and crease data is now included in FBX control mesh exports. This allows tools like Blender and Alias to apply crease and subd modifiers automatically.
- Improved stroke performance.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed ‚ÄòShared With Me‚Äô section in LandingPad Collab menu not showing if the user was not part of any organization teams.
- Can no longer see grab highlight of objects dropped on to an invisible layer.
- Closed volumes such as strokes and text objects no longer export as double-sided in FBX exports.
- Fixed some environments causing LIV avatars to be invisible.
- Disabled import, save and export for reviewer and viewer licence members in organizations.
- Fixed measurement readout on import preview being incorrect if you changed the unit and then the value of measurement.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed entering a custom measurement value during the import process not being accurate if you did it more than once.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Fixed entering a custom measurement value during the import process not being accurate if you did it more than once.

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Added a new lobby environment.
- Renamed Reference Library to Templates as well as renaming some of its internal folders.
- Added a section in the lobby settings to for organization admins to pair headsets with LandingPad accounts.
- The First Sketch Experience now triggers on the first time a new user enters New Sketch rather than on first launch of the app.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Made the material of assets currently being downloaded in Collab a purple grid again instead of white.
- Grabbing the web browser and pressing the red button now re-attaches it to your hand rather than closing it.
- Empty layers are now included when saving a sketch.
- The environment is no longer saved with the sketch file unless edited during the sketch session.

üöÄ Features & Tweaks

- Added a new lobby environment.
- Renamed Reference Library to Templates as well as renaming some of its internal folders.
- Added a section in the lobby settings to for organization admins to pair headsets with LandingPad accounts.
- The First Sketch Experience now triggers on the first time a new user enters New Sketch rather than on first launch of the app.

üêõ Bug Fixes

- Made the material of assets currently being downloaded in Collab a purple grid again instead of white.
- Grabbing the web browser and pressing the red button now re-attaches it to your hand rather than closing it.
- Empty layers are now included when saving a sketch.
- The environment is no longer saved with the sketch file unless edited during the sketch session.
